price: 113. »Mi Señor es Quien los juzgará; si fueseis conscientes de ello (no diríais lo que habéis dicho sobre ellos).
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
